title: Union Budget 2026-27 Presented Today, February 1, 2026
content:
# Union Budget 2026-27 Presented Today, February 1, 2026

Ek important update hai. Government ne Union Budget 2026-27 aaj Parliament mein present kiya hai. This is a crucial financial statement outlining the nation's economic priorities and fiscal strategy for the upcoming financial year.

*   **Presentation Date:** The Union Budget for the financial year 2026-27 is being presented today, February 1, 2026.
*   **Presented By:** Finance Minister Smt. Nirmala Sitharaman is delivering her ninth consecutive Budget speech.
*   **Time of Presentation:** The Budget speech began at 11:00 AM Indian Standard Time (IST).
*   **Availability of Documents:** The full Budget documents, including the Annual Financial Statement, Demands for Grants, and the Finance Bill, will be accessible on the "Union Budget Mobile App" and the official Union Budget Web Portal after the completion of the Finance Minister's speech.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Visit the Official Union Budget Web Portal here](https://www.indiabudget.gov.in)

*Published on: 1 February 2026*
